aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.name: Salah Sfar
aboutme.bio: Full Stack Software Engineer with more than 3 years of experience developing scalable web applications in Agile environments. Skilled at optimizing performance and delivering secure, maintainable solutions.

project1.title: 91Funds Platform
project1.description: Developed the backend for security features, including two-factor authentication (2FA), and a statistics dashboard for 91, a crypto investment platform that enables users to access expert-managed cryptocurrency trading portfolios through NFTs as a gateway. Implemented comprehensive API documentation using Swagger for improved developer experience and easier integration.

project2.title: ReCut
project2.description: Developed a backend system for a video content platform offering legal access to movie and TV show clips in social media-friendly formats, featuring precise video trimming with a 90% reduction in processing time, and robust copyright compliance systems for secure content management.

project3.title: EcoSystem Dao
project3.description: Developed a full-stack system to support entrepreneurs by providing opportunities to meet experts, join assistance programs, and participate in hackathons. Implemented real-time notifications and chat features for seamless communication between entrepreneurs and mentors. Built a responsive frontend with React and Redux for state management.

project1.title: FitStack
project1.description: Developed the FitStack ecosystem including a website, mobile application (React Native), and an admin dashboard. Implemented using NestJS, PostgreSQL, Redis, Next.js, and Docker.
project1.technologies: React Native, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Redis, Next.js, Docker

discordClone.title: Discord Clone
discordClone.description: A full-stack Discord clone built with modern web technologies. This real-time communication platform allows users to create servers, channels, and communicate via text messages and voice chat. Features include user authentication, real-time messaging with Socket.io, server and channel management, direct messaging, and voice chat capabilities.

realtimeChat.title: Real-Time Chat App
realtimeChat.description: An application that allows users to create accounts and communicate via real-time messaging.

learnHub.title: LearnHub
learnHub.description: A digital platform that helps people find the right training opportunity based on their specific needs and objectives.

stressTest.title: Stress Test
stressTest.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Next.js and TypeScript that enables developers to stress test APIs with configurable concurrent requests, providing real-time performance metrics, latency analysis, and visual health scoring. Features include concurrent request handling up to 10k calls, detailed analytics dashboard, and responsive design. Deployed and optimized on Linux servers for maximum performance and reliability.

jobHuntDiary.title: Job Hunt Diary
jobHuntDiary.description: Job Hunt Diary is a comprehensive job application tracking system designed to help job seekers organize and manage their job search process efficiently. This modern web application provides a centralized platform for tracking job applications, interviews, and follow-ups, eliminating the need for scattered spreadsheets or notes.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features include internationalization support (English and French), interactive UI components with Framer Motion animations, and a terminal-inspired interface. The portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and professional experience in an elegant, user-friendly design.

ecommerceBackend.title: E-commerce Backend API
ecommerceBackend.description: A scalable e-commerce backend API built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. This API powers a complete online shopping platform with features for product management, user authentication, and order processing. Implemented secure JWT authentication, cloud storage integration with AWS S3, and followed RESTful architecture principles for a robust and maintainable codebase.

internship.gpro.description: Designed and developed a digital platform consolidating information necessary for building a great career by selecting a professional course.

internship.satoripop.description: Developed a mobile application to offer users an immersive experience to follow match scores, events, and news of the Premier League.

footer.description: Full-stack developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences with modern web technologies.
